headline.main: CAUCASUS LOOMS AS VITAL FRONT; British Assume That Wave and Russians Will Make a Firm Stand There

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 1 -- All eyes are now concentrated on Russia. As the tides of battle surge on that front, there is another front in the Middle East that may prove to be one of the war's most important.
abstract: Indian participation and Caucasus as vital front discussed

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
